cause.description:
It is important to raise awareness about poverty in third-world countries because in order to help get rid of this misery people need to get informed so one day they can take action.
1. Worker's in the sugar canes make a maximum of 3$ a day for 1 tonne of sugar canes
2. The families suffer from malnutrition
cause.mission: Raise awareness about poverty in the Dominican Republic
cause.name: Stop Poverty
